revision.text:
'''[[Echidna]]s''' are Australian egg-laying mammals also known as spiny anteaters.
'''Echidna''' may also refer to:
*[[Echidna (mythology)]], monster in Greek mythology and namesake of the mammal *[[(42355) Typhon I Echidna]], the natural satellite of the asteroid 42355 Typhon *[[ECHIDNA]], high-resolution neutron powder diffractometer at Australia's research reactor OPAL *Echidna, character in the video game ''[[The Bouncer (video game)|The Bouncer]]''
==Taxonomic genera== *[[Echidna (fish)|''Echidna'' (fish)]] {{au|J. R. Forster, 1788}}, a genus of moray eels *''Echidna'' {{au|Cuvier, 1797}}, a junior homonym referring to the mammals commonly known as [[echidna]]s *''Echidna'' {{au|Merrem, 1820}}, junior homonym for a genus of African snakes now treated as ''[[Bitis]]''
==See also== *[[Knuckles the Echidna]] from the Sonic the Hedgehog video game series *Echidna Parass, fictional character from [[List of Black Cat characters#Echidna Parass|the ''Black Cat'' series]]
{{disambiguation}} [[Category:Taxonomy disambiguation pages]]
